name: Remove a product from the cart
title: Remove a product from the cart

testSteps.description: Given the user opens the login page

children.description: User Test QA Automation opens the registration page
User Test QA Automation navigates to "https://mcstaging.supermercadosnacional.com/customer/account/login/"
waits for 3 seconds
User Test QA Automation takes a screenshot of "step"

testSteps.description: And the user logs in with username "omnitestqaevidencias@gmail.com" and password "secret_sauce_Omni"

children.description: User Test QA Automation logs in with valid credentials
User Test QA Automation waits for 2s
<<page element located by xpath ('*//button[@class="wpn-popup-close "]')>>.click()
<<page element located by xpath ('//input[@id="email"]')>>.enterValue('omnitestqaevidencias@gmail.com')
<<page element located by xpath ('//input[@id="password"]')>>.enterValue('secret_sauce_Omni')
<<page element located by xpath ('*//div[@class="block block-customer-login"]//button[@class="action login primary" and @id="send2"]')>>.click()
User Test QA Automation waits for 6s
User Test QA Automation takes a screenshot of "step"

testSteps.description: Given the user has added a product to the cart

children.description: User Test QA Automation navigates to the Res category
User Test QA Automation waits for 8s
<<page element located by xpath ('//span[contains(text(),"Regresar a la tienda")]')>>.click()
User Test QA Automation waits for 10s
User Test QA Automation waits until page element located by xpath ('//span[@class="action nav-toggle"]') does become visible
<<page element located by xpath ('//span[@class="action nav-toggle"]')>>.click()
User Test QA Automation waits for 3s
User Test QA Automation waits until page element located by xpath ('(//span[@class="category-name" and text()="Carnes, Pescados y Mariscos"])[1]') does become visible
User Test QA Automation hovers the mouse over page element located by xpath ('(//span[@class="category-name" and text()="Carnes, Pescados y Mariscos"])[1]')
User Test QA Automation waits for 3s
User Test QA Automation waits until page element located by xpath ('(//span[@class="category-name" and text()="Res"])[1]') does become visible
<<page element located by xpath ('(//span[@class="category-name" and text()="Res"])[1]')>>.click()
User Test QA Automation waits for 5s
User Test QA Automation takes a screenshot of "step"

testSteps.description: When the user clicks the Remove from Cart button

children.description: User Test QA Automation decreases quantity for "Carne De Res Molida Brangus, Lb" in cart

User Test QA Automation waits until page element located by xpath ('//strong[@class="product name product-item-name"][normalize-space(a/text())="Carne De Res Molida Brangus, Lb"]/ancestor::li[contains(@class,"product-item")]//button[contains(@class,"decrease-qty") and contains(@title,"Disminuir cantidad")]') does become visible

<<page element located by xpath ('//strong[@class="product name product-item-name"][normalize-space(a/text())="Carne De Res Molida Brangus, Lb"]/ancestor::li[contains(@class,"product-item")]//button[contains(@class,"decrease-qty") and contains(@title,"Disminuir cantidad")]')>>.click()
#log decrease quantity for "Carne De Res Molida Brangus, Lb"
User Test QA Automation waits for 5s
User Test QA Automation takes a screenshot of "step"

testSteps.description: Then the cart should be empty

children.description: User Test QA Automation ensures that true does equal true
User Test QA Automation takes a screenshot of "step"

actors.name: User Test QA Automation
can: ScheduleWork { scheduler: { clock: { timeAdjustment: { milliseconds: 0 } }, interactionTimeout: { milliseconds: 5000 } } }
